Name: Very Short
Description: <15 minutes; quick activities completed in brief moments

Name: Full Focus
Description: Requires complete concentration and distraction-free environment

Name: High Focus
Description: Requires significant attention but can handle minor interruptions

Name: Medium Focus
Description: Can be done during light activities (walking, commuting)

Name: Low Focus
Description: Can be done as background activity with divided attention

Name: Offline Only
Description: Activity can be done completely offline

Name: Flexible
Description: Activity works in both online/offline contexts
